channel.title: How Do I View My MoparScape ScreenShots
channel.description:
Hi,
Im new moparscape and i've been taking screen shots (press F9) But I dont Know how to veiw Them Can you tell me if you know how. :confused:

item.title: How Do I View My MoparScape ScreenShots
item.dc:creator: @Bebemycat2 Bebe
item.description:
@Bebemycat2 wrote:

[quote=“BloodRayne, post:2, topic:41957”]Not quite sure about F9… But if you press the “Print Scrn” button by F12, it will take a screenshot. Then you open Microsoft Paint, and press “Ctrl + V”

Your screenshot will then appear.[/quote]
Or even better you can hit Alt+ Prnt Scrn and it will only take a screenshot of the selected window

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I View My MoparScape ScreenShots

item.title: How Do I View My MoparScape ScreenShots
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

Not quite sure about F9… But if you press the “Print Scrn” button by F12, it will take a screenshot. Then you open Microsoft Paint, and press “Ctrl + V”

Your screenshot will then appear.

Read full topic
